companies.title: Co Founder
companies.description: Established chess camp to give inner city kids opportunities to learn and develop their chess skills over the summer. Taught large and small group lectures and oversaw the management of over 90 kids who have attended the camps. Designed visually-appealing website used to promote the camp and frequently updated it throughout the years.

companies.title: Software Development Intern
companies.description: Developed a back-end analysis engine to critique fantasy sport play, using Python and SQL Server database. Created a unique rating algorithm that adopts certain elements of the ELO rating system, using Python and Excel. Involved in mobile app prototyping and testing, using Ionic and Cordova to emulate Android and iOS platforms.

companies.title: Data Analysis Intern
companies.description: Managed important company data analytics and data processing for over 120 local and national vendor companies. Created individual weekly progress reports through analysis of consumer data and sent them out to Tuee’s vendors.

companies.title: Instructor
companies.description: Instructed students from Pre-K to 12th grade in topics from basic mathematical concepts to advanced Calculus. Learned specific teaching approaches and methods to successfully guide students through complex math concepts.

companies.title: Teaching Assistant
companies.description: Taught classes in various subjects to students of the same age and younger.
